title: World's First Projection Mouse - Does It Suck?
description: Thanks to our sponsor Dollar Shave Club new members can get a one month trial of any of their razors for only $1 -- with free shipping, just a few bucks a month after that -   This video features the Odin projection mouse... So is it any good or does it suck?  FOLLOW ME IN THESE PLACES FOR UPDATES Twitter -  Facebook -  Instagram -  Google Plus -
